alert.note: Alert for Leslie (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 1:54PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Leslie County through 230 PM EDT... At 154 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chappell, or 9 miles south of Hyden, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cutshin around 205 PM EDT. Cinda and Hoskinston around 210 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Stinnett, Smilax, Wendover, Hyden and Wooton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
